hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that deep #under a vast lake#, one can find #the Fire Temple#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that a #fountain wall# hides the #Goron Shop#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #the Sun's Song#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that a #spider in the wasteland# holds #a Recovery Heart#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that ##Dodongo's Cavern## has #0# major items.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that obtaining the #underwater silver rupees in Gerudo Training Ground# rewards #a Recovery Heart#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Underwater Silver Rupee Chest

GC (Maze).text: They say that #the Ice Cavern# is on the path to #the Tower#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that plundering #the Bottom of the Well# is a foolish choice.

GV (Waterfall).text: What did Zelda suggest that Link do when diplomacy didn't work?^${12 39 C7}Triforce.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that the #northern basement of the Water Temple# contains...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Blue Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Water Temple GS Near Boss Key Chest

HC (Malon).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# hoards #a Recovery Heart#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the way of the hero.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Zora's Fountain# is a foolish choice.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #the Serenade of Water# can be found at #the Sacred Forest Meadow#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #a Recovery Heart#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Requiem of Spirit# can be found at #the Sacred Forest Meadow#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that deep in #Dodongo's Cavern a pair of scrubs# sell...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
hinted_locations: Dodongos Cavern Deku Scrub Near Bomb Bag Left
Dodongos Cavern Deku Scrub Near Bomb Bag Right

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that a #giant pot in the Shadow Temple# holds #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that ##the Ice Cavern## has #2# major items.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #village well# leads to #the Water Temple#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Graveyard# is on the way of the hero.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #the Song of Time# can be found at #Hyrule Castle#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that plundering #the Forest Temple# is a foolish choice.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #the Song of Storms#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #the Minuet of Forest# can be found at #the Desert Colossus#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that ##the Haunted Wasteland## has #0# major items.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: Are you stuck? Try asking for help in our Discord server or check out our Wiki!

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #the Market# is on the path of #time#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that a chest in the #central pillar of Water Temple# contains #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #the Sun's Song#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #Ganon's Tower# is protected by a powerful barrier.

ToT (Right).text: They say that in the #crater, a spider in a crate and a single scrub# guard...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Red Rupee#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: This isn't where I parked my horse!

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that plundering #the Lost Woods# is a foolish choice.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that inside #Jabu Jabu#, one can find #Jabu Jabu's Belly#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that a #spider behind webs# in a grotto holds #a Stray Fairy#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #the Song of Storms#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that in the #river in the Water Temple# lies...^ #a Deku Stick# and #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Ice Cavern# hoards #a Recovery Heart#.
